participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, enjoys socializing and staying active.
participant_1.background: I enjoy playing Magic: the Gathering in my free time. I'm going to the park with my pug, Corky. I am not sure if my co-worker likes me, but I have a dog named Max. I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike. I take pride in my appearance.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Caring and dedicated, has a passion for cooking and helping others.
participant_2.background: My favorite place to eat is at home, where I can enjoy my lasagna and not have to worry about the weather. My dog introduced me to my first and second wives. I'm almost finished with my degree. I was born in Baton Rouge. I am a doctor.

content.text: Hey! Not much. Just finished my 8th hour at the hospital.
Oh man, I'm sure you're exhausted. What do you do there?
I'm a doctor. I love my job but it's definitely challenging.
That's really cool! I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet.
Well you've got plenty of time to figure it out. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go to the park with my dog, Corky. I also enjoy playing Magic: the Gathering, quilting, and mountain biking.
Oh wow, that's a lot of hobbies! You must be really busy.
I like to keep busy. It helps me stay sane.
I hear that. I like to keep busy too. I'm going to go home and cook myself a lasagna. What are you doing for dinner?
I'm not sure yet. I might order takeout or cook something myself.
Well, whatever you decide to do, I hope you have a good night!
